description: Decimal expansion of real number y such that y = Gamma(x) is a minimum.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Gamma Function
maple: Digits:=500; x0:=fsolve(Psi(x)=0, x); evalf(GAMMA(x0), 120) # _Iaroslav V. Blagouchine_, Feb 16 2016
mathematica: First@ RealDigits[ FindMinimum[ Gamma[x], {x, 1.4}, WorkingPrecision -> 2^7][[1]]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 03 2010 *)RealDigits[ Gamma[x /. FindRoot[ PolyGamma[0, x] == 0, {x, 1}, WorkingPrecision -> 100]]][[1]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 23 2012 *)
crossrefs: Cf. A030169 for value of x.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
